name: 鄭國忠
objective: 本課程之內容包括:化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論,動力學數據之處理,各式理想反應器之設計,非理想狀態反應器之討論,單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論.
schedule:
Week 1:
Introduction
Weeks 2 and 3:
Chapter 1- Mole Balances
Weeks 4 and 5:
Chapter 2- Conversion and Reactor Sizing
Weeks 6 and 7:
Chapter 3- Rate Law and Stoichiometry
Week 8:
Mid-exam
Weeks 9 and 10:
Chapter 4-Isothermal Reactor Design
Weeks 11 and 12:
Chapter 5-Collection and Analysis of Rate Data
Weeks 13 and 14:
Chapter 6-Multiple Reactions
Week 15:
Chapter 8-Steady-State Nonisothermal Reactor Design
Week 16:
Chapter 9-Unsteady State Nonisothermal Reactor Design
Week 17:
Chapter 10- Catalysis and Catalytic Reactors
Week 18:
Final-exam
scorePolicy:
Mid-exam: 30
Final-exam: 40
Class Attendance and Homework: 30-
Max.:100
